name: Modern Shooting Arena
description:
This is a very interesting and very challenging first-person shooter game. He has high-definition graphics and is simple to operate. As a commando, you need to have incredible bravery, even in the face of brutal enemies. You have to destroy all the enemies, to complete the mission. Use your mighty weapon to destroy more enemies. Join us, fight is about to start!

Features:
- Modern weapons to aim exactly
- Realistic 3D jungle environment
- Stunning HD graphics
- Multiple missions
- Amazing sound effects
- Good control
- Realistic game play.
